attributes.action: Stopping EU Nationals voting in any future Scottish Indy Referendum
attributes.background: In our referendum in 2014 Scots living in the rest of the UK were not allowed to vote in the Scottish Independence Ref. Yet EU Nationals were. This must not be allowed to happen in any future referendum. Only Scots living in the UK and British Citizens in Scotland should be allowed the vote.

rejection.details:
In the 2014 referendum, the Scottish Parliament made the law about who could vote. You can read the law here:

http://www.legislation.gov.uk/asp/2013/13/contents
